db:abstract.db:para: For specifying a role to an XmlListModel.

db:section.db:title: isKey : bool
db:section.db:para: Defines whether this is a key role. Key roles are used to determine whether a set of values should be updated or added to the XML list model when XmlListModel::reload() is called.

db:section.db:title: name : string
db:section.db:para: The name for the role. This name is used to access the model data for this role.
